contest-event.event-date:
July 11, 1903 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Test Piece Contest
New Pavilion, Mountain Ash, Glamorgan
Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. Best basses - Plymouth Workmen. 13th annual contest. 12 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 6:49 p.m. July 25, 2016, 3:58 p.m.
1 Great Western Colliery Silver J. H. Roberts
2 Plymouth Workmens H. Bentley
3 Fochriw Rufus Fletcher
4 Caerphilly H. Taylor
Unknown Result Penrhiw Unknown
Unknown Result Ogmore Valley Silver Band William Smith
Unknown Result Blaenavon Templars J. Broom
Unknown Result Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band T. Eastwood
Unknown Result Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Walter Exley
Unknown Result Cwmparc Samuel Radcliffe
Unknown Result Pentre Volunteers J. Sheridan
Unknown Result Lewis Merthyr Band R. Dawson
